name: Breachers
abstract: Breachersâ„¢ is a tactical 5v5 VR FPS. Plan your assault or orchestrate your defense as a team through intense close-quarters combat. Climb, vault, rappel, swing, shoot & strategize your way to victory!

detail.app_languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Dutch, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
## Featured Content
- New Map: Dam
- Death Recap
## Improvements
- Added measures against play spacing.
- Added a "queue again" button to the match canceled popup.
- Added matchmaker heartbeat to further reduce "9/10  player matches" in competitive
- Added a yellow 'X' to all breachable floor hatches to better communicate them to the player.
- Added a limit of one report per category per match, to combat spam reporters.
- Static fields will no longer deploy when there is not enough space above it.
- Changed Singapore to Japan server for Asia option in custom servers.
- Changed individual score calculation in preparation of a coming update that will allow player's individual performance, being reflected in SP gained/lost from a competitive match
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
